content: thread link 1 - for chat pics and help **saving paper** - *this is so simple you may not even need to print the pattern - or maybe just print page 2 - the page with the instructions- and read the rest on screen * **sometimes when i m making something that s taking a while i just need to finish something - that s when i feel the need for speed ** also handy for last-minute gifts roughly 2-3 hours to make one knitted as a strip not bottom-up because i prefer the drape of the stitch worked this way **three shapes - all with the same neat and tidy braid-effect edge even when you re knitting fast you can still have nice details - doesn t take any longer ☻ ** tall single worn folded double purple one - approx 130m 145 yds wide single with a twist shown in cream - aprox 200m 220 yds double loop green - approx 250m 275 yds malabrigo rasta is a lovely yarn for this but a bit thicker than the yarns i used for my samples so you ll probably only need about 21 stitches and possibly one size larger needle many thanks to the testers knittingnoodler heather2009 selene1985 sophjacksam 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/stitchnerds/3150325/1-25
